getPending(uint256,address).details: gets the user's stream pending reward

getReleaseTime(uint256,address).details: gets the user's stream reward release time

getRewardsAmount(uint256,uint256).details: calculates and gets the latest released rewards.

getTotalAmountOfStakedAurora().details: gets the total amount of staked aurora

stake(uint256).details: a user stakes amount of AURORA tokens The user should approve these tokens to the treasury contract in order to complete the stake.

unstake(uint256).details: unstake amount from user shares value. The rest is re-staked

withdraw(uint256).details: withdraw amount in the pending pool. User should wait for pending time (tau constant) in order to be able to withdraw.

getStream(uint256).notice: this function doesn't return the stream schedule due to some stake slots limitations. To get the stream schedule, refer to getStreamSchedule

documentation.text: @dev Testing parameter to help the test of the withdraw with some stress.

@dev gets the total amount of staked aurora
 @return totalAmountOfStakedAurora + latest reward schedule

@dev unstake amount from user shares value. The rest is re-staked
 @param amount to unstake
@dev called before touching the contract reserves (stake/unstake)

WARNING: rewards are not claimed during unstake.
 The UI must make sure to claim rewards before unstaking.
 Unclaimed rewards will be lost.
 `_before()` must be called before `_unstake` to update streams rps

@dev calculate the shares for a user per AURORA stream and other streams
 @param amount the staked amount
 WARNING: rewards are not claimed during stake.
 The UI must make sure to claim rewards before adding more stake.
 Unclaimed rewards will be lost.
 `_before()` must be called before `_stake` to update streams rps
 compounded AURORA rewards.

@dev withdraw stream rewards after the release time.
 @param streamId the stream index
